pages.text: Welcome to the AHZ narutomod, this guide book added by the anbubingobook addon will aim to guide you through some of the commonly asked questions in the mod. $(br) To get started with this mod you will need a few things, namely a kunai and a shuriken in your inventory to unlock the ninja advancement $(br2) Welcome to the AHZ narutomod, this guide book added by the anbubingobook addon will aim to guide you through some of the commonly asked questions in the mod. $(br) To get started with this mod you will need a few things, namely a kunai and a shuriken in your inventory to unlock the ninja advancement
